title: Marketing Data Analysis System
description: A system to analyze marketing data, including campaign performance tracking, customer segmentation, ROI calculations, and actionable insights generation.

userStories.title: Campaign Data Import
userStories.description: As a marketing analyst, I want to import marketing campaign data from various sources so that I can consolidate all campaign metrics in one place.
acceptanceCriteria: Support CSV and JSON file imports
Validate data structure and required fields
Log import errors with descriptive messages

userStories.title: Campaign Performance Metrics
userStories.description: As a marketing analyst, I want to calculate key performance metrics for campaigns so that I can evaluate their effectiveness.
acceptanceCriteria: Metrics are computed per campaign and aggregated totals

userStories.title: ROI Calculation
userStories.description: As a marketing manager, I want to calculate the return on investment for each campaign so that I can determine which campaigns are profitable.
acceptanceCriteria: Display ROI alongside other campaign metrics

userStories.title: Customer Segmentation
userStories.description: As a marketing analyst, I want to segment customers based on behavior and demographics so that I can target campaigns more effectively.
acceptanceCriteria: Segment by demographic attributes (age, location, etc.)
Segment by behavioral data (purchase history, engagement)
Export segment definitions and membership lists

userStories.title: Campaign Comparison Report
userStories.description: As a marketing manager, I want to compare performance across multiple campaigns so that I can identify best practices and optimize future campaigns.
acceptanceCriteria: Show all key metrics in comparison view

userStories.title: Trend Analysis
userStories.description: As a marketing analyst, I want to view performance trends over time so that I can identify patterns and seasonality.
acceptanceCriteria: Display metrics over daily, weekly, monthly intervals

userStories.title: Insights Generation
userStories.description: As a marketing manager, I want automated insights based on the data so that I can quickly understand what actions to take.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify top and bottom performing campaigns
